Accountant Job at Beem Farm Foods




        
    

        
        Beem Farm Foods is a fast-growing food processing and protein brand serving thousands of households across Lagos.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a highly organised and detail-driven Accountant to take full ownership of our financial records, sales reconciliation, inventory accounting, and financial reporting.
	This role is critical to ensuring that every order is paid for, every product is accounted for, and the company has clear, accurate financial visibility at all times.


Key Responsibilities
Sales & Revenue Control:


	Reconcile all daily sales from WhatsApp, website, POS, transfers and field sales
	Confirm that every dispatched order has been fully paid for
	Flag underpayments, unpaid orders and discrepancies
	Maintain daily revenue and payment reports.


Inventory & Cost Tracking:


	Track all meat, fish and food inventory from processing to sale
	Reconcile physical stock against system stock
	Monitor wastage, losses and variances
	Maintain cost per pack and gross margin by product.


Expenses & Vendor Payments:


	Track all business expenses and verify invoices
	Process and record supplier payments
	Prevent duplicate or unauthorised payments.


Payroll & Staff Finance:


	Prepare monthly payroll
	Calculate commissions and bonuses
	Maintain staff payment records.


Financial Reporting:


	Prepare weekly and monthly financial reports
	Produce profit & loss statements
	Maintain cashflow and expense tracking
	Support management with financial insights.


Tax & Compliance:


	Prepare and file VAT, PAYE and other statutory deductions
	Support audits and compliance requirements.


Qualifications


	HND / BSc in Accounting, Finance or related field
	3+ years of experience in accounting or finance (FMCG, retail or food production is a plus)
	Ability to use accounting softwares
	Strong Excel or Google Sheets skills
	Experience handling sales reconciliation and inventory is highly preferred
	High level of honesty, accuracy and attention to detail.


Compensation
Salary & Benefits:


	Gross Salary: N200,000 - N250,000 per month
	Annual Performance Bonus (based on KPIs)
	13th Month Salary
	Health Insurance (HMO).


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: akintayotimiloluwa@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note


	Application Question(s): Are you located in Surulere and environs.
